name: R5-GraphCompartmentRule-R4-GraphCompartmentRule
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 GraphCompartmentRule into FHIR R4

element.display: The compartment rule is defined in the accompanying FHIRPath expression.

target.display: The compartment rule is defined in the accompanying FHIRPath expression.
target.comment: R5 `custom` is assumed equivalent to R4 `custom` (no map, but codes match)
R5 `different` is assumed equivalent to R4 `different` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The compartment must be identical (the same literal reference).

target.display: The compartment must be identical (the same literal reference).
target.comment: R5 `identical` is assumed equivalent to R4 `identical` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The compartment must be the same - the record must be about the same patient, but the reference may be different.

target.display: The compartment must be the same - the record must be about the same patient, but the reference may be different.
target.comment: R5 `matching` is assumed equivalent to R4 `matching` (no map, but codes match)
